description: Black Opal Ventures is a firm founded by seasoned investors and operators, Tara Bishop and Eileen Tanghal, who met at MIT and later pursued their professional careers in healthcare and venture capital respectively. The firm is dedicated to bringing together the knowledge and practices of healthcare and technology to address unsolved problems in the U.S. healthcare system, aiming for transformational outcomes. Black Opal Ventures focuses on identifying and supporting technology startups that align with their mission to build better businesses and a better future, emphasizing the importance of diversity and the potential for industry disruption.
